LanguageData.Hediffs_MovingLv1.label: Kinryoku Lv.1
LanguageData.Hediffs_MovingLv1.description: Tip 1: Kinryoku (Muscle strength). Friendly reminder, different meals grant various amounts of experience.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MovingLv2.label: Kinryoku Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_MovingLv2.description: Tip 2: There are also processed foods that accumulate experience points even if the ability boost is not activated.
LanguageData.Hediffs_Moving.label: Kinryoku
LanguageData.Hediffs_Moving.description: Thank you for letting me experience all the flavors of the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
LanguageData.Hediffs_Moving.stages.0.label: initial
